feed.title: MeshCentral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.23
entry.content:
• aa8f45f4 Version 1.1.23
  • 7cf14a2b meshctrl deviceinfo error on unescaped nodeid
  • 7e7361de add/fix iplocation
  • 4cd7b408 fix linux storage volumes 0kb
  • bc6451fe migrate groups.enabled in oidc #6104
  • f1ba76a4 fix device notifications not dismissing on other web sessions
  • 385a4738 forgot oidc group schema fix
  • 5c13f178 fix oidc sync groups
  • 323ef2d5 fix cookieEncoding hex for 2fa #6096
  • dd249938 fix keyboard shortcuts and add restore default keyboard shortcuts (#6103)
  • 30d958fb fix auth-oidc-callback examples
  • 1c8d6649 fix oidc groups.claim undefined
  • b22e56b6 add openidConnectStrategy to mkdocs.yml
  • bc2f34b6 remove sendconsoletext from computer-identifiers.js
  • e8da6a60 add nodeid to info in console #6097
  • 77d268d0 listdevice filter should be string #6091
  • 23ee76e2 fix mac volume detection for older os
  • be3e333b add macos storage volumes using df
  • e3f68226 add linux storage volumes using df
  • b71b4d04 bring power-monitor server side to fix mac battery levels
  • bf7957eb add zerossl acme (#6084)
  • 19eb1235 set min to node 16 (#5955)
  • 274bb525 allow msh get/set/delete from console (#6074)
  • 33c0e822 fix mobile ui upload mesh agent core
  • 56d6527b add run commands to mobile ui (#6044)
  • 3ce2fd92 Missing languages added to translator
  • eb27334b Doc update - Addition of 'How to Contribute' section (#6046)
  • 414d9b95 undo #5452 and #6036 commits
  • 1747ff75 fix email in use meshctrl reply #6036
  • f39b6f88 add smtp user/pass to schema and help docs
  • ca868afd update translate readme.txt url #6041
  • 410c84c3 add --mysql --mariadb arguments for stateless run (#6031)
  • 18b731fd Updated install document - Corrected chmod command examples. (#6035)
  • 832e6186 forgot semicolon in a hurry meshctrl.js #6029
  • 7b8cf857 dont require, use readFileSync and phase for config.json in meshctrl #6029
  • 1dca9e22 fix missing connect-flash again #6028
  • 30d570f2 translation fixes for meshcentral-data-domain (#6027)
  • f854c804 fix meshctrl configfile undefined
  • f5891f29 fix custom public folders for dns domains (#6018)
  • 1da33f0a add nice404 to invite and fix invite with dns use #6017
  • e025e955 fix authStrategyFlags using wrong domain (#6015)
  • ccf57bee add missing rights to meshctrl and meshServerRightsArrayToNumber (#6004)
  • 4ba08a96 unEscape ssh/rdp creds from db (#6001)
  • 548edd13 add lastbootuptime to columns and device powered on event (#5999)
  • 31ebb21e fix ipv6 only letsencrypt #5988
  • 4a3c6db0 Fixing documentation of gmail smtp (#5998)
  • f9af1ffc fix powertimeline daylights savings on mobile ui #5997
  • 95e7997e fix daylight savings in powertimeline #5997
  • 9081a6ae Google Workspace OAuth2 SMTP Documentation (#5939)
  • afc61658 nochecks description attempt 3 #5987
  • c9c0a6cb fix nocheck description again #5987
  • b46c322c fix nochecks description #5987
  • 4ff5a5c9 add letsencrypt nochecks to schema #5987
  • 65d1346e open files/folders on desktop with files and console with openfile (#5986)
  • 5d1c8ca6 add open web link to mobile ui (#5985)
  • 9294488d fix name display for oauth (#5980)
  • d2a0946f add user import via csv file (#5978)
  • 3be8ec5a add mac uninstall and fix windows uninstall (#5976)
  • 10248944 check db exists first before creating in postgres (#5968)
  • 8e8cc4b3 rename 2x mac image
  • ce93c896 fix null values in filters
  • 7b67b992 fix postgres nedbtodb
  • 95bbd715 add filter for events (#5975)
  • 8e6cc149 set flatpickr to 1 minute increments (#5974)
  • 862e2ee8 Various grammar, spelling, and clarity issues. (#5964)
  • 81e98033 fix mac memory part number

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.24
entry.content:
• 5d5e861a Version 1.1.24
  • 26ac23c8 fix web-rdp/web-ssh save creds per user
  • 5a7e3d98 fix allowSavingDeviceCredentials description
  • abbb0fa9 fix sharing keyboard input after Ctrl+Alt+Delete #6120
  • 89b67ff9 fix sharing latency and timer
  • 6c685d55 fix realname undefined #6118
  • 49b56126 Updated ExpressJS to 4.19.2

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.25
entry.content:
• 86713cac Version 1.1.25
  • 95d60fef Added Catalan language support and Italian fixes.
  • b4e7e738 show previous logins for all users and fix mobile ui account permissions
  • 62cae4cf fix autobackup: true
  • aaad8b79 fix autobackup not running if no backupintervalhours specified
  • b0d9b17e fix external auth with loginkey passthrough #4883
  • 991c23c5 fix remote input lock button from desktop views #4542
  • 87c57455 fix invite code installation type display #4541
  • 707982a7 fix Localization Settings not saving server side #2164
  • a8fc5e11 disable open button in files for android
  • 40ac6aa6 fix download button in files for android
  • 1d9de2e1 add lock button to mobile ui #6251
  • ee0018e4 fix force2fa for files and groupactions #6247 #6246
  • 721c9091 add proxmox to isVM
  • 2630931e dont allow go to folder button for android
  • 13b8ca36 fix Hungarian translate #6234
  • a59da2fb Remove link to archived user guide in new docs
  • c3470f49 forgot d7encoding css
  • 3d815824 Update readme.md
  • 9619a83b update package-lock.json
  • f6c7761a update ws to 8.17.1 (#6214)
  • 9fd3e4c5 Check agent IP address instead of user IP address for agent file downloads. (#6155)
  • 118b0c58 Added "trustedproxy" to the arguments list (#6211)
  • 57442e49 fix filter refilling in chrome and safari (#6209)
  • 602eb3c6 add encoding options to remote desktop (#6198)
  • 28c522c5 add android version+api to dtails page
  • df91c90d fix ip fliters from files #3401
  • 81557ab2 forgot user new events filter fix #6189
  • 6b21baca fix new events appearing when filtered #6189
  • 46ebadf4 fix mac mpkg agent again (#6194)
  • 6c3e60e1 update translate.json
  • 7955bc49 include connect-flash with passport to allow displaying of errors
  • 482e79f9 fix meshcentral-web-domain translate displaying (#6180)
  • 0a89d079 add userSessionsSort for session sorting (#6177)
  • c053c14d fix star covering desc in list view #6174
  • 5950b2c8 make sure to clear flash errors after display to avoid showing again #6154
  • 42a07e9d fix passport failureRedirect for subdomain paths
  • d7341ab1 display flash errors for external auths like saml or oidc on the login screen #6154
  • 74d62526 increase uploadFile buffer to speed up file uploads #6169
  • b08f3827 fix obj.user._id undefined for rdp/ssh #6127
  • 69769927 fix oidc paths with aliasport #6148
  • b1c3e2a8 remove power-monitor server side to fix windows battery levels #6143
  • c67a76bc fix oidc reauth #6132
  • 62199d80 fix handleStrategyLogin invalid token/user
  • 52a21941 require connect-flash for oidc #6132
  • 2b3c329a remove comments and console.log meshctrl.js
  • 17cf36ed add installflags to agentdownload in meshctrl.js #6133
  • a171cde2 update package-lock.json

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.26
entry.content:
• 92869ec7 Version 1.1.26
  • 9264b9d2 fix autoRemoveInactiveDevices is 1 #6268
  • d8a91d31 fix loading=lazy minify bug
  • 5e71bcc6 fix minifed files
  • 4d75d48e add watchdog to config-schema
  • df647480 fix language change event log
  • 31c32358 fix message box Korean translate #1392
  • 4b891c5b fix cancelhelp translate error #4888
